title: [PC/Xbox/PS4] Fallout 76 "Our Future begin" - 重奪國土

replies.msg:
https://youtu.be/M9FGaan35s0


The Making of Fallout 76 - Noclip Documentary
Gameplay 詳細介紹 (可能唔完全準確)
https://youtu.be/gi8PTAJ2Hjs?t=18m3s


正式推出日 - 2018年11月14日

Pre-order 方法:
Download Bethesda Launcher
https://fallout.bethesda.net/
係Fallout 76果版禁Pre - Purchase (右上角)
可以Paypal
完

BETA參加方法:
經上面方法會直接當你有份玩BETA，唔洗redeem code。
其他方法就睇收據/等email

簡單介紹:
Fallout 76 設定係2102年既維珍尼亞，核戰後25年。玩家設定是Vault 76既住民之一，Vault係核戰後25年的當日打開，讓住民"重奪國土"。

Fallout 76將會以Online形式進行，比Fallout 4大4倍的地圖。廠方會營運server，目前有人估計係一個server可容納24名玩家，唔會係100人(根據E3既情報)，而上面條記錄片就有製作人員話係約24-36個。完全唔會有單人模式。

遊戲會有生存元素，要食野飲水，中得耐輻射會突變，俾你一D特別能力(有好有唔好)。

可以建築自己既營地，Offline時營地會消失，轉ser營地會跟住一齊，如果咁岩新server既營地地點本身已經有人起左野，營地會pack番做個工具箱同保留你既設計，去第二度時可以直接set番個營地出黎。

NPC方面無人類NPC，會有機械人之類，同有一個仲識用槍既屍鬼陣營，同好多怪物。
可以PVP，但會限制唔俾人瘋狂強奸同一個player，同會有通緝系統。角色死左會係附近重生。

FULL TODD HOWARD INTERVIEW|BETHESDA E3 2018
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wpCLE2IIvXE

台仔巴哈做左更多更詳細既資料:
【情報】Fallout76 E3 2018 懶人包 6/13新增更多的東西
https://forum.gamer.com.tw/C.php?bsn=2023&snA=18295&tnum=26

等左好耐唔見有人開post講，心急開左先又懶得打字，先自膠

我Pre-order左了，急不及待想玩玩了
電腦ps4 server唔知通唔通呢

真心
eld scrolls legend 補完左好多5代缺失嘅部分
特別係講緊世界大戰個一part
補完左梭默由勝轉敗嘅故仔

5代嘅一d傳言
eg 皇帝拎住金芒長劍、梭默主帥死後有魔族帶走
呢d都有提到

同埋黑兄會消亡嘅故事(類似5代黑兄前傳)

同埋最重要係提供好多圖黎睇角色形象、建築等等(b社建模垃圾，所以搞到人樣好醜 )

replies.msg:
原來係唔同種

Mutants

Fallout 76 is actually set before all the other games in the series. As such, there are no Super Mutant in the game as they haven't been created yet. What we see instead is some sort of variant Mutant, significantly smaller and more humanoid than their super brethren.

https://www.usgamer.net/articles/fallout-76-new-creatures-all-the-new-wildlife-animals-and-enemies-in-fallout-76

《異塵餘生 76》Tricentennial 版還包含以下內容：

• Tricentennial 動力裝甲飾品，包含 T-51、T-45、T-60、X-01 等型號
• Tricentennial 武器飾品，包括 10MM 手槍、手斧與雷射步槍
• 帥酷有勁的避難所男孩吉祥物頭套
• 山姆大叔愛國服裝
• 避難所男孩歡慶問候表情符號
• 一流的 Tricentennial 工房海報
• Tricentennial 紀念相框
• 取得《異塵餘生 76》B.E.T.A. 資格（搶先測試申請）

Fallout 76 officially releases November 14, but your first chance to experience the game can begin much earlier than that. We’re excited to announce that our B.E.T.A. (Break-It Early Test Application) will arrive first on Xbox One on Tuesday, October 23, and one week later for PlayStation 4 and PC players on Tuesday, October 30.

Song - Wouldn't It Be Nice
Artist - Beach Boys

Lyrics:

Wouldn't it be nice if we were older
Then we wouldn't have to wait so long?
And wouldn't it be nice to live together
In the kind of world where we belong?

You know it's gonna make it that much better
When we can say goodnight and stay together

Wouldn't it be nice if we could wake up
In the morning when the day is new?
And after having spent the day together
Hold each other close the whole night through?

Happy times together we've been spending
I wish that every kiss was never ending
Oh, wouldn't it be nice?
